name: filesystem
description: Project-scoped file and folder operations and terminal commands. Each project has its own workspace under workspaces/<telegram_user_id>/<project_name>/; use the task's project_id. Includes run_command to run shell commands in the project workspace.

project_id.description: Project ID (from task tracking); determines workspace folder

path.description: Relative path within the project workspace

command.description: Shell command to run (run_command); cwd is the project workspace
